fieldSet.fieldSet_1: contact_category, designation, department, title, first_name, middle_name, last_name, contact_phone_no, email_id_1
fieldSet.fieldSet_2: address_line_1, address_line_2, address_line_3, country, state, district, city, pin_code

field.template: <input type="checkbox" id="${asset_id}" #if (kendo.toString(applicable_ind) =="1") {# checked #} else {# #}# class="k-checkbox" style="opacity: 1; margin: 0%; width: 100%; -webkit-appearance: checkbox;" >
